old: いい男、どっかにいないかな～
column2: I hope I can find a good man somewhere～
speaker: Lucina

old:
逞しくってワイルドな戦士もいいけど
知的で紳士な術士もいいわよね
悩むなぁ～
column2: I like a strong and tough soldier, but a smart and gentlemanly magician is also nice, right? I can't decide～
speaker: Lucina

old:
うーん
でもやっぱり、お金持ちがいいかしら
column2:
Hmmm
but I still think I'd rather be rich.
speaker: Lucina
